= Num Records =
*This method will return the number of rows.*

=== How to use ===
This method needs three items:
 # The first is the table name where you want to count
 # The column name you want to match with the value
 # The value of the column name

How to use this:

{{{
$db = new dbcon;
$status = '1';

$num = $db->numrecords('accounts','status',sanisql($status));
}}}

The above code will output the number of rows where status=1.
